feed.title: Img3Sum
feed.subtitle: Open-source project that supports translating, summarizing and converting images to text.

entry.title: Deliverable 04
entry.content:
4th deliverable was creating website under the github pages using the Jekyll framework.

First, We decided to use minima theme on our site.

Next, we decided the large structure and layout of the website. Our website is consisted of following pages.

  1. Index/home page
    • On the homepage we wrote our mission statements.
    • we added links(readthedocs, github) related to our projects.
    • List of recent blog posts links for news.
  2. About the Project
    • Details and contents of our project.
  3. Features
    • Desctiption of the functions that our project provides.
  4. Contact
    • Team membersâ€™ email address
entry.summary: 4th deliverable was creating website under the github pages using the Jekyll framework. First, We decided to use minima theme on our site.

entry.title: Deliverable 03
entry.content:
1. Ceate documentation for project using the ReadTheDocs framework at our local machine using the Sphinx theme.

    pip install sphinx 
pip install sphinx-rtd-theme

  1. Create more comprehensive documentaton with following pages.

    • Index (=About page) :
    • Installation
    • How to use
    • Contribution Guidelines
    • Licenses

  2. Pull our github repository and make docs directory. Upload markdown files into the main branch of your repository under the docs folder

    git pull origin
mkdir docs
cd docs
cp rtd folders docs/

  3. Connect the GitHub docs documentation folder with the ReadTheDocs hosting.

    Hosting our official readthedocs documents by referring to the readthedocs and readthedocshosting.

  4. Following is our readthedocs link.

    Img3Sum Official Document : Img3Sum Readthedocs
entry.summary: Ceate documentation for project using the ReadTheDocs framework at our local machine using the Sphinx theme. pip install sphinx pip install sphinx-rtd-theme

entry.title: Deliverable 02
entry.content:
Prior to the start of the project, We created a GitHub account. In Delivery 01, a repository called Img3Sum was created. It is Open-source projects that support translating, summarizing and converting images to text.

We add APACHE LICENSE and VERSION 2.0 in repo. The readme file was organized very well. We created two versions of the readme file which is korean and english. The contents of readme file is Core Concept, Features, How to Run?. We gave each team member the contributor authority in Img3sum Repo. The version was set to 0.0.1. Each team member posted a code with a commit message wenever there was a correction to the task given to them.
entry.summary: Prior to the start of the project, We created a GitHub account. In Delivery 01, a repository called Img3Sum was created. It is Open-source projects that support translating, summarizing and converting images to text.

entry.title: Deliverable 01
entry.content:
The first task was given in the open source course. First of all, we thought about what kind of project to carry out. And, AI has become the most hot topic these days. So, I decided to make something related to it.

After extracting text from the image, we planned a project to create a three-line summary with extracted sentences, and also a three-line summary translated into Korean. Therefore, our team name was decided as Img3Sum based on the three-line summary for the purpose of project creation.

A new GitHub repository for the Img3Sum project was created.

And, they shared their roles.

First, SON is in charge of building a backend using flask and building a frontend.

In addition, OH plays a role in finding a program that extracts images into text.

In addition, JANG plays a role in summarizing the text extracted from the image by 3 lines, translating it into Korean, and then creating a model that proceeds with a 3 line summary.

Finally, YOON was responsible for importing the Papago API.
entry.summary: The first task was given in the open source course. First of all, we thought about what kind of project to carry out. And, AI has become the most hot topic these days. So, I decided to make something related to it. After extracting text from the image, we planned a project to create a three-line summary with extracted sentences, and also a three-line summary translated into Korean. Therefore, our team name was decided as Img3Sum based on the three-line summary for the purpose of project creation.
